casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. CLEMONS
v.
KASICH 2018-0701 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 1, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Kennedy, Fischer, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Mandamus. On respondent's motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Cause dismissed. On relator's motion to strike motion to dismiss, request for preliminary hearing, and motion to seal. Motions denied.

French, J., concurs in part and dissents in part and would grant relator's motion to seal exhibits.
